20110107190049.000|20110107190052.000|CC1|>> BREAKING NEWS IN THE         
20110107190052.000|20110107190053.000|CC1|INVESTIGATION OF AN UNSPEAKABLE 
20110107190053.000|20110107190053.000|CC1|CRIME.                          
20110107190053.000|20110107190057.000|CC1|A SUSPECT IS IDENTIFIED IN A    
20110107190057.000|20110107190059.000|CC1|SERIES OF SEXUAL ASSAULTS       
20110107190059.000|20110107190100.000|CC1|AGAINST DISABLED WOMEN WHO      
20110107190100.000|20110107190104.000|CC1|COULD NOT FIGHT BACK.           
20110107190104.000|20110107190105.000|CC1|PHILLIP: THERE'S BREAKING NEWS  
20110107190105.000|20110107190105.000|CC1|IN THIS CASE.                   
20110107190105.000|20110107190107.000|CC1|IT'S DISTURBING FOR EVEN THE    
20110107190107.000|20110107190108.000|CC1|DETECTIVES WHO WERE             
20110107190108.000|20110107190109.000|CC1|INVESTIGATING.                  
20110107190109.000|20110107190110.000|CC1|INVESTIGATORS HAVE IDENTIFIED   
20110107190110.000|20110107190112.000|CC1|ONE OF THE SUSPECTS IN A SERIES 
20110107190112.000|20110107190114.000|CC1|OF SEXUAL ASSAULTS ON DISABLED  
20110107190114.000|20110107190114.000|CC1|WOMEN.                          
20110107190114.000|20110107190115.000|CC1|EYEWITNESS NEWS REPORTER        
20110107190115.000|20110107190117.000|CC1|MELISSA MACBRIDE IS LIVE IN     
20110107190117.000|20110107190119.000|CC1|MONTEREY MARK WITH THE DETAILS. 
20110107190119.000|20110107190120.000|CC1|>> Reporter: PHILLIP, WE'RE     
20110107190120.000|20110107190121.000|CC1|FINDING OUT THE SHERIFF'S       
20110107190121.000|20110107190122.000|CC1|DEPARTMENT SAYS SUSPECT NUMBER  
20110107190122.000|20110107190125.000|CC1|FOUR, HE'S THIS MAN SEEN RIGHT  
20110107190125.000|20110107190129.000|CC1|HERE IN THIS SKETCH AND THIS    
20110107190129.000|20110107190131.000|CC1|BLURRY SURVEILLANCE PICTURE.    
20110107190131.000|20110107190134.000|CC1|HE'S BURT HICKS OF LOS ANGELES. 
20110107190134.000|20110107190136.000|CC1|LAPD DETECTIVES CALLED THE      
20110107190136.000|20110107190137.000|CC1|SHERIFF'S DEPARTMENT.           
20110107190137.000|20110107190140.000|CC1|IT TURNS OUT THAT HICKS IS      
20110107190140.000|20110107190142.000|CC1|SERVING TIME FOR SEXUAL ASSAULT 
20110107190142.000|20110107190144.000|CC1|AND WHAT'S UNCLEAR IS IN THE    
20110107190144.000|20110107190146.000|CC1|INCIDENT IN THE LAPD CASE IS    
20110107190146.000|20110107190148.000|CC1|ONE OF THE ASSAULTS DROPPED OFF 
20110107190148.000|20110107190150.000|CC1|AT SHERIFFS HEADQUARTERS.       
20110107190150.000|20110107190151.000|CC1|>> IT IS PUTTING THEIR CASE     
20110107190151.000|20110107190153.000|CC1|TOGETHER SO THAT WE CAN SIT     
20110107190153.000|20110107190155.000|CC1|DOWN AND COMPARE THE TWO.       
20110107190155.000|20110107190157.000|CC1|WE DON'T KNOW IF THEY'RE        
20110107190157.000|20110107190158.000|CC1|OVERLAPPING CASES OR WHAT.      
20110107190158.000|20110107190202.000|CC1|BUT WE DO KNOW IS THAT THE      
20110107190202.000|20110107190204.000|CC1|SUSPECTS IN OUR CASE ARE THE    
20110107190204.000|20110107190206.000|CC1|SUSPECT IN THEIRS SO WE DO HAVE 
20110107190206.000|20110107190207.000|CC1|ONE POSITIVELY IDENTIFIED.      
20110107190207.000|20110107190208.000|CC1|THEY HAVE ALSO IDENTIFIED A     
20110107190208.000|20110107190210.000|CC1|SECOND SUSPECT BUT WE'RE NOT    
20110107190210.000|20110107190212.000|CC1|READY TO RELEASE THAT NAME YET  
20110107190212.000|20110107190214.000|CC1|BECAUSE WE HAVE FURTHER         
20110107190214.000|20110107190216.000|CC1|INVESTIGATION TO DO IN          
20110107190216.000|20110107190217.000|CC1|COMPARING THE NOTES.            
20110107190217.000|20110107190218.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DETECTIVES HAVE    
20110107190218.000|20110107190220.000|CC1|NOT RELEASED THE NAME OF THE    
20110107190220.000|20110107190222.000|CC1|FACILITY WHERE THEY BELIEVE     
20110107190222.000|20110107190223.000|CC1|BURT HICKS WORKED.              
20110107190223.000|20110107190225.000|CC1|IT'S UNKNOWN WHERE THE ASSAULT  
20110107190225.000|20110107190226.000|CC1|OF 10 DISABLED WOMEN TOOK PLACE.
20110107190226.000|20110107190227.000|CC1|AUTHORITIES BELIEVE THEY        
20110107190227.000|20110107190228.000|CC1|HAPPENED IN THE LAST THREE      
20110107190228.000|20110107190231.000|CC1|YEARS AND SOME OF THE 100 HOURS 
20110107190231.000|20110107190232.000|CC1|OF VIDEO IS FROM SURVEILLANCE

20110107190240.000|20110107190242.000|CC1|OF 2010 AND THEY'VE BEEN

20110107190243.000|20110107190246.000|CC1|SEVERAL MONTHS AND THE PERSON

20110107192830.000|20110107192832.000|CC1|OF EXPLOSION EARLY THIS MORNING.
20110107192832.000|20110107192834.000|CC1|THE NOISE WAS COMING FROM THE   
20110107192834.000|20110107192836.000|CC1|GARAGE WHERE CARS WERE ON FIRE, 
20110107192836.000|20110107192838.000|CC1|TIRES AND WINDOWS WERE POPPING.

20110107192840.000|20110107192843.000|CC1|LIVE AT THE SCENE WITH A LOOK
